pageContext.claim: “Biden supported the outrageous fuel economy standards that have hammered the auto industry, and I reversed that rule, I actually reversed it and it helped millions of families be able to afford a car.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did roll back fuel economy standards. But those standards didn’t “hammer” the industry, as Trump suggests. Auto sales continued to grow during the seven years the standards were in place, according to an analysis of U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis data. Moreover, some automakers including Ford has sued to keep the Obama-era standards in place.
